summary: This document is an email correspondence detailing the timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's arrival and initial housing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019. It describes his movement from general population to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a Psychology Observation unit, clarifying that the latter was not a suicide watch.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document details the timeline of his arrival and housing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019, including movements for safety and psychological observation.

events.title: Epstein Arrives at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and was initially placed in the Receiving and Discharge area, then moved to general population as staff were unaware he was a high-profile inmate.

events.title: Moved to Special Housing Unit
events.description: The Warden identified Epstein as high-profile and moved him to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to concerns for his personal safety in general population.

events.title: Placed in Psychology Observation
events.description: Upon return from court, Epstein was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation by Psychological Service staff. The document clarifies this was NOT a suicide watch, and he was under 24-hour observation to assess readiness for SHU.

events.title: Returned to SHU with Cell Mate
events.description: Epstein was returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) with a cell mate, where he remained until July 23, 2019.

locations: NYM (likely refers to New York Metropolitan area or a specific facility designation)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the MCC on July 6, 2019, and was initially placed in general population because staff were unaware he was a high-profile inmate.
On July 7, 2019, the Warden moved Epstein to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to safety concerns.
From July 8, 2019, Epstein was placed in Psychology Observation for evaluation, which was explicitly noted as NOT a suicide watch.
Epstein was returned to the SHU with a cell mate on July 10, 2019, and remained there until at least July 23, 2019.
